message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm asking for $115 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I'm on a tight budget.
I appreciate you're on a budget, Bob, but $90 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $105.  Let's meet in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle this time.
